snippet: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner said Tuesday that Argentina would formally complain to the United Nations after Britain sent one of its most modern warships to the disputed Falkland Islands.
abstract: Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announces that Argentina will formally complain to the United Nations after Britain sent one of its most modern warships to the disputed Falkland Islands; accuses Prime Min David Cameron of Britain of militarizing their nations' dispute over sovereignty of the South Atlantic archipelago.
lead_paragraph: President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner said Tuesday that Argentina would formally complain to the United Nations after Britain sent one of its most modern warships to the disputed Falkland Islands.
